chapter.text: you peek inside the door.^1500^media He appears to be taking notes as he watches.^1500 You can't see exactly what he is watching,^500 but you can only hear gears turning and screams.^1500 You hear the tape stop and rewind,^750 and play again.^3000 The door slams shut before you can get a better look.^1500 You feel a chill.^1500 Must have blown shut.^1500 Best to keep walking.
